Uses of Interface
com.jme.input.controls.Trigger

  • Packages that use Trigger 
    Package Description
    com.jme.app  
    com.jme.input  
    com.jme.input.controls

    • Uses of Trigger in com.jme.app

      Fields in com.jme.app declared as Trigger 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Trigger[] ChaseCameraAppState.toggleRotateTrigger  
      protected Trigger[] ChaseCameraAppState.zoomInTrigger  
      protected Trigger[] ChaseCameraAppState.zoomOutTrigger  
      Methods in com.jme.app with parameters of type Trigger 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void ChaseCameraAppState.setToggleRotationTrigger​(Trigger... triggers)
      Sets custom triggers for toggling the rotation of the cam default are new MouseButtonTrigger(MouseInput.BUTTON_LEFT) left mouse button new MouseButtonTrigger(MouseInput.BUTTON_RIGHT) right mouse button
      void ChaseCameraAppState.setZoomInTrigger​(Trigger... triggers)
      Sets custom triggers for zooming in the cam default is new MouseAxisTrigger(MouseInput.AXIS_WHEEL, true) mouse wheel up
      void ChaseCameraAppState.setZoomOutTrigger​(Trigger... triggers)
      Sets custom triggers for zooming out the cam default is new MouseAxisTrigger(MouseInput.AXIS_WHEEL, false) mouse wheel down

    • Uses of Trigger in com.jme.input

      Methods in com.jme.input with parameters of type Trigger 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void InputManager.addMapping​(java.lang.String mappingName, Trigger... triggers)
      Create a new mapping to the given triggers.
      void InputManager.deleteTrigger​(java.lang.String mappingName, Trigger trigger)
      Deletes a specific trigger registered to a mapping.
      void ChaseCamera.setToggleRotationTrigger​(Trigger... triggers)
      Sets custom triggers for toggling the rotation of the cam default are new MouseButtonTrigger(MouseInput.BUTTON_LEFT) left mouse button new MouseButtonTrigger(MouseInput.BUTTON_RIGHT) right mouse button
      void ChaseCamera.setZoomInTrigger​(Trigger... triggers)
      Sets custom triggers for zooming in the cam default is new MouseAxisTrigger(MouseInput.AXIS_WHEEL, true) mouse wheel up
      void ChaseCamera.setZoomOutTrigger​(Trigger... triggers)
      Sets custom triggers for zooming out the cam default is new MouseAxisTrigger(MouseInput.AXIS_WHEEL, false) mouse wheel down

    • Uses of Trigger in com.jme.input.controls

      Classes in com.jme.input.controls that implement Trigger 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  JoyAxisTrigger  
      class  JoyButtonTrigger  
      class  KeyTrigger
      A KeyTrigger is used as a mapping to keyboard keys.
      class  MouseAxisTrigger
      A MouseAxisTrigger is used as a mapping to mouse axis, a mouse axis is movement along the X axis (left/right), Y axis (up/down) and the mouse wheel (scroll up/down).
      class  MouseButtonTrigger
      A MouseButtonTrigger is used as a mapping to receive events from mouse buttons.
      class  TouchTrigger
      Class to trigger TouchEvents, keycode can be TouchInput.ALL(=0) or TouchInput.KEYCODE_*

    • Uses of Trigger in com.jme.util

      Methods in com.jme.util with parameters of type Trigger 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void MaterialDebugAppState.registerBinding​(Trigger trigger, Filter filter)
      Will reload the filter's materials whenever the trigger is fired.
      void MaterialDebugAppState.registerBinding​(Trigger trigger, Spatial spat)
      Will reload the spatial's materials whenever the trigger is fired
